Articles.Content:
> 
> Kerbals reproduce like humans?

 even if they didn't it would still hurt like hell to be harpooned just under your stomach

> 
> even if they didn't it would still hurt like hell to be harpooned just under your stomach

I thought that the thing is supposed to belong to the Kerbal...if it is a harpoon...poor kerbal...

> 
> Kerbals reproduce like humans?

 SQUAD probably won't be answering that question.
